```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```


```{r}
excel_sheets("data/raw_data/2005-18-uk-local-regional-co2-emissions.xlsx")
```

```{r}
emissions <- read_xlsx("data/raw_data/2005-18-uk-local-regional-co2-emissions.xlsx", 2, skip = 1) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(second_tier_authority == "Scotland") %>% 
  rename(country = 1) %>% 
  select(-2) %>% 
  pivot_longer(-c(1,2,3,4, population_000s_mid_year_estimate, area_km2, per_capita_emissions_t, emissions_per_km2_kt), names_to = "emission_source_sector", values_to = "emissions")
```
